hero.title: Unleash Your Epic Adventures
hero.description: Join fellow adventurers in epic campaigns and unforgettable gaming experiences
hero.quote: The dice may be random, but the stories we create together will last forever. Every roll is a new possibility, every character a new perspective.

events.title: Community Events
events.description: Join our regular game nights, one-shots, and campaigns for players of all experience levels.

workshops.title: Miniature Workshops
workshops.description: Learn painting techniques and craft terrain with our experienced artists and hobbyists.

storytelling.title: Storytelling Sessions
storytelling.description: Participate in our narrative-focused events and improve your storytelling skills.

events.title: Upcoming Events
events.description: Join us for our next adventures, workshops, and community gatherings.

blog.title: Latest from our Blog
blog.description: Tips, stories, and updates from our community.

cta.title: Join Our Community
cta.description: Whether you're a seasoned player or just starting out, there's a place for you in our community. Join us for adventures, creativity, and friendship.

about.title: About Tales of Bruss'hell
about.description: Our mission, our team, and our story.
about.descriptionMission: Tales of Bruss'hell is dedicated to fostering a welcoming community for tabletop role-playing enthusiasts, miniature painters, and storytellers of all experience levels.
about.descriptionMission2: We believe in the power of collaborative storytelling to build connections, develop creativity, and provide a space where everyone can feel welcome to express themselves.
about.descriptionMission3: Through regular events, workshops, and community initiatives, we aim to make the world of tabletop gaming accessible to all while promoting the values of inclusivity, creativity, and camaraderie.
about.descriptionInclusivity: We create a welcoming environment where everyone feels valued and respected, regardless of background or experience level.
about.descriptionCreativity: We encourage imagination, artistic expression, and innovative problem-solving through our games and activities.
about.descriptionCommunity: We foster meaningful connections and friendships through shared experiences and collaborative storytelling.
about.descriptionExcellence: We strive for quality in our events, workshops, and community initiatives, continuously improving our offerings.
about.descriptionTeam: Our dedicated volunteers who make the magic happen.
about.descriptionHistory: Tales of Bruss'hell was founded in 2023 by a group of passionate tabletop gaming enthusiasts who wanted to create a more inclusive and welcoming space for players in Brussels.
about.descriptionHistory2: What started as informal gatherings in local bar quickly grew into a thriving community. By 2024, we had officially registered as a non-profit organization to better serve our growing membership.
about.descriptionHistory3: Today, we're proud to host regular in-person events, workshops, and campaigns while continuing to expand our offerings to reach more people who share our passion for tabletop gaming and storytelling.
about.descriptionJoinUs: Become part of our community and help us create unforgettable stories together.

membership.title: Join Our Community
membership.description: Become a member and unlock exclusive benefits.
membership.descriptionWhyBecomeMember: Joining Tales of Bruss'hell gives you access to exclusive benefits while supporting our mission to create an inclusive tabletop gaming community.
membership.descriptionPriorityEventAccess: Get early registration for popular events and workshops before they open to the general public.
membership.descriptionExclusiveDiscounts: Enjoy reduced fees for workshops and special events, plus discounts with our partner game stores.
membership.descriptionCommunityResources: Access our lending library of rulebooks, miniatures, and terrain for your home games.
membership.descriptionSupportOurMission: Your membership fees directly support our community initiatives and help us create more inclusive gaming spaces.
membership.descriptionVotingRights: Voting rights at annual general meeting
membership.descriptionAnnualGiftPackage: Annual gift package with Tales of Bruss'hell merchandise
membership.membershipValidation: All memberships are valid for one year from the date of registration.

membershipForm.title: Become a Member
membershipForm.description: Fill out the form below to join our community. You'll receive a confirmation email with payment instructions.
membershipForm.interests: Areas of Interest (Select all that apply)

membership.descriptionFAQ: Find answers to common questions about our membership program.

faq.titleHowToJoin: How do I become a member?
faq.descriptionHowToJoin: To become a member, simply fill out our membership application form. Once submitted, you'll receive a confirmation email with payment instructions. After payment is confirmed, you'll get immediate access to all member benefits.
faq.descriptionMembershipDuration: Memberships are valid for one year from the date of registration. You'll receive a reminder email before your membership expires, giving you the option to renew.
faq.descriptionCancelMembership: Yes, you can cancel your membership at any time. However, please note that membership fees are non-refundable. To cancel, simply contact our membership team.
faq.titleUpgradeMembership: Can I upgrade my membership tier?

membership.descriptionMembershipOptions: Choose the membership tier that best fits your needs. Each option comes with its own set of benefits.

contribute.title: Share Your Knowledge
contribute.description: Are you passionate about D&D, miniature painting, or storytelling? We welcome guest contributors to our blog!
contribute.description2: Whether you're a seasoned Dungeon Master with tips to share, an artist with painting tutorials, or a storyteller with insights on character development, we'd love to feature your expertise.

accessibility.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibility.description: Our commitment to making our content accessible to everyone.
accessibility.commitment: D&D ASBL is committed to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. We are continually improving the user experience for everyone and applying the relevant accessibility standards.

conformanceStatus.title: Conformance Status
conformanceStatus.description: Our website aims to conform to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 level AA standards. These guidelines explain how to make web content more accessible for people with disabilities and more user-friendly for everyone.
conformanceStatus.ongoing: We have conducted internal reviews to identify and fix accessibility issues. However, we recognize that this is an ongoing process, and we are committed to regular testing and improvements.

features.title: Accessibility Features
features.intro: Our website includes the following accessibility features:
features.semantic: Semantic HTML structure for better screen reader navigation
features.keyboard: Keyboard navigation support for all interactive elements
features.contrast: Sufficient color contrast ratios for text and important graphics
features.textResize: Text resizing without loss of content or functionality
features.altText: Alternative text for images and meaningful link descriptions
features.aria: ARIA landmarks and roles where appropriate
features.responsive: Responsive design that works on various devices and screen sizes

physical.title: Physical Accessibility at Events
physical.intro: In addition to digital accessibility, we strive to make our in-person events accessible to all participants:
physical.venues: We select venues with wheelchair accessibility whenever possible
physical.info: We provide information about accessibility features of venues in advance
physical.serviceAnimals: We welcome service animals at all our events
physical.seating: We offer reserved seating for individuals with specific needs
physical.accommodations: We are open to accommodation requests and will do our best to meet them

feedback.title: Feedback and Assistance
feedback.intro: We welcome your feedback on the accessibility of our website and events. If you encounter accessibility barriers or have suggestions for improvement, please contact us at:
feedback.response: We try to respond to feedback within 3 business days.

financial.title: Financial Accessibility
financial.intro: We believe that financial constraints should not prevent anyone from participating in our community. We offer:
financial.reducedFees: Reduced membership fees for students, seniors, and individuals with limited income
financial.scholarships: Scholarship opportunities for events with higher registration costs
financial.freeEvents: Free community events throughout the year
financial.paymentPlans: Payment plans for membership fees upon request
financial.contact: To learn more about our financial accessibility options, please contact us at

improvement.title: Continuous Improvement
improvement.intro: We are committed to ongoing accessibility improvements. Our accessibility roadmap includes:
improvement.audits: Regular accessibility audits of our website
improvement.training: Staff training on accessibility best practices
improvement.consultation: Consultation with accessibility experts and users with disabilities
improvement.technology: Implementation of new technologies and standards as they become available
improvement.review: This statement was created on April 29, 2025, and will be reviewed and updated annually or when significant changes are made to the website or our services.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.description: The rules and guidelines for using our services.
terms.intro1: Please read these Terms and Conditions ("Terms", "Terms and Conditions") carefully before using the website and services operated by Tales of Bruss'hell ("us", "we", "our").
terms.intro2: Your access to and use of our services is conditioned on your acceptance of and compliance with these Terms. These Terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use our services.
terms.intro3: By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access our services.
terms.membershipIntro: Membership in Tales of Bruss'hell is subject to the following conditions:
membershipList: You must provide accurate, current, and complete information during the registration process.
Membership fees are non-refundable except in exceptional circumstances at the discretion of Tales of Bruss'hell.
Membership is valid for one year from the date of registration and must be renewed annually.
Membership benefits are non-transferable and for the sole use of the registered member.
Tales of Bruss'hell reserves the right to revoke membership for violation of our code of conduct or these Terms.
terms.eventsIntro: Participation in Tales of Bruss'hell events and activities is subject to the following conditions:
eventsList: Registration for events may require additional fees, which will be clearly indicated.
Event cancellations by participants may be subject to our refund policy, which varies by event.
Tales of Bruss'hell reserves the right to cancel or reschedule events due to unforeseen circumstances.
Participants must adhere to our code of conduct during all events and activities.
Photography and recording at events are permitted unless otherwise specified, but should not disrupt the event or infringe on others' privacy.
terms.codeOfConductIntro: All members and participants in Tales of Bruss'hell activities are expected to:
codeOfConductList: Treat others with respect, kindness, and consideration.
Refrain from discriminatory, harassing, or offensive behavior.
Respect the privacy and personal boundaries of others.
Follow the specific rules and guidelines for each event or activity.
Use Tales of Bruss'hell resources and facilities responsibly.
terms.codeOfConductViolation: Violation of our code of conduct may result in removal from events, suspension, or termination of membership without refund.
terms.intellectualProperty1: The content on our website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Tales of Bruss'hell or its content suppliers and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.
terms.intellectualProperty2: You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, create derivative works of, publicly display, publicly perform, republish, download, store, or transmit any of the material on our website without our prior written consent.
terms.userContent1: By posting, uploading, or otherwise making available any content on our platforms or during our events, you grant Tales of Bruss'hell a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide, perpetual license to use, modify, publicly display, reproduce, and distribute such content in connection with our services.
terms.userContent2: You represent and warrant that you own or control all rights to the content you provide, and that such content does not violate these Terms or any applicable law.
terms.liability1: In no event shall Tales of Bruss'hell, its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from:
liabilityList: Your access to or use of or inability to access or use our services;
Any conduct or content of any third party on our services;
Any content obtained from our services; and
Unauthorized access, use, or alteration of your transmissions or content.
terms.governingLaw1: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Belgium, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
terms.governingLaw2: Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights. If any provision of these Terms is held to be invalid or unenforceable by a court, the remaining provisions of these Terms will remain in effect.
terms.changes1: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of any changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date.
terms.changes2: Your continued use of our services after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the new Terms.

contactInfo.contactText: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at:
